Method.name: buildFormLink
Method.Implementation:
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ; History: ; ; 13-Mar-2006 hjrb SR14178: added YPARA to link ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; set link = ##class(COM.fwk.ui.html.LinkToNetMgrForm).%New()
set link.text = text set link.title = title set link.target = target set link.netMgrForm = netMgrForm set link.netMgrKeys = netMgrKeys set link.netMgrAdditionalParams = netMgrAdditionalParams if ($data(netMgrParam) '= 0) { //SR14178 set link.netMgrParam = netMgrParam //SR14178 } //SR14178 set link.netMgrFormHistory = netMgrFormHistory set link.netMgrReturnKeys = netMgrReturnKeys set link.netMgrDontMap = netMgrDontMap set link.additionalUrlParam = additionalUrlParam
quit link

Method.name: buildHelpFormLink
Method.Implementation: // Setting the Default value for the text. if (text = "") { set text = "" } set link = ##class(COM.fwk.ui.html.LinkToNetMgrHelp).%New() set link.text = text set link.title = title set link.netMgrForm = netMgrForm set link.netMgrKeys = netMgrKeys set link.netMgrAdditionalParams = netMgrAdditionalParams set link.netMgrFormHistory = netMgrFormHistory set link.netMgrReturnKeys = netMgrReturnKeys quit link

Method.name: buildTranslationLink
Method.Implementation:
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Build the translation link ; ; Params: ; ; History: ; ; 17-Sep-2007 GM SRBR014661 Replace double quotes("") to single quotes('') ; This disables the HTML ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set link = ##class(COM.fwk.ui.html.LinkToNetMgrTranslation).%New()
set link.text = text set link.title = title set link.netMgrFormHistory = netMgrFormHistory set link.netMgrReturnKeys = netMgrReturnKeys set link.componentGlobalReference = componentGlobalReference set link.translationGlobalReference = translationGlobalReference set componentText=$$Replace^COMUtilStr(componentText,"""","´") ;BR014661 set link.componentText = componentText set translationText=$$Replace^COMUtilStr(translationText,"""","´") ;BR014661 set link.translationText = translationText
quit link

Method.name: buildCSPLink
Method.Implementation:
set link = ##class(LinkToRoutine).%New()
set link.text = text set link.commandToExecute = "*DO|**class(COM.fwk.ui.csp.CSPUtil).%New().startCSPPage('"_cspFile_"')"
quit link
